name: Simple-tv-player-swap
tagline: Bookmarklet to swap Simple.tv Silverlight/HTML5 player for Safari Quicktime
body:
### How this works
Are you having problems playing Simple.TV streams on OSX? Give this bookmarklet a try.

1. Drag the below Link to your bookmark bar in Safari.
1. Open your Simple.TV webpage
1. Start playing live tv or a recording
1. Click your "Play in Quicktime" bookmark
1. Simple.TV's player is swapped out for JW Player 5 which will play the stream with Quicktime.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
